vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for CS Commercial Service District uses on property zoned a CS Commercial Service District with consideration for a Specific Use Permit for a truck stop on the north corner of South Lancaster Road and Cherry Valley Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff:  Denial
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions
Z234-115(MB)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council at the public hearings on August 28, 2024 and September 11, 2024, and is scheduled for consideration on November 13, 2024.
